TITLE: Episode 7 - The Great Depression
DESCRIPTION: This week, we talk the Mueller report, The Green New Failure, Georgia’s abortion law backlash, the Rockland vaccine Martial Law, conclude the Jussie Smollett incident, and have a Q&A.
